---
title: Netlify CLI init command
description: Initialize a new site locally
---

# `init`

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (GENERATE_COMMANDS_DOCS) -->

Configure continuous deployment for a new or existing site

**Usage**

```bash
netlify init
```

**Flags**

- `manual` (_boolean_) - Manually configure a git remote for CI
- `force` (_boolean_) - Reinitialize CI hooks if the linked site is already configured to use CI
- `gitRemoteName` (_option_) - Name of Git remote to use. e.g. "origin"

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->
